entry.title: Ukraine's Kharkiv Front Line Holds Despite Bombardment
entry.content: Russian forces resumed airstrikes on Ukraine’s second-largest city and continued pounding other cities as they sought to break the will of Ukraine’s resistance on the seventh day of the war.

entry.title: Food Shortages, Last Goodbyes: Ukrainians Face Their New Reality
entry.content: Russia began a new, bloodier phase of the war and the capital Kyiv is bracing for the indiscriminate shelling of civilian neighborhoods.

entry.title: As Russia Sanctions Intensify, Several Oligarchs Speak Out Against War
entry.content: A parade of Russian businessmen burnished their antiwar stances in recent days as Western governments tightened a noose around Kremlin-connected businesses and property.
